tasks.name: Check and sort through the mail
Get kids supplies for school project
Put laundry in washer and dryer

goals.name: Exercise for at least two hours total
Find a new trail to take a walk on

quotes.quote: Pleasure in the job puts the perfection in the work.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
quotes.author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: If there are nine rabbits on the ground, if you want to catch one, just focus on one.
quotes.author: Jack Ma

quotes.quote: You may delay, but time will not.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: While one person hesitates because he feels inferior, the other is busy making mistakes and becoming superior.
quotes.author: Henry C. Link

quotes.quote: You must remain focused on your journey to greatness.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Nothing is particularly hard when you divide it into small jobs.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Practice isn't the thing you do once you're good. It's the thing you do that makes you good.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in getting up every time we do.
quotes.author: Confucius
